context:
### Idiom: 宗庙社稷
### Meaning: 宗庙祭祀祖先的场所；社稷古代帝王诸侯所祭的土神和谷神。代表封建统治者掌握的最高权力。也借指国家。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
Translated by gpt4; Corpus: wikipedia
source: 击灭智瑶，晋阳解围后，赵襄子奖赏有功的五人，首位就是高赫。张孟谈说：“晋阳之战，高赫无大功，现在第一个受赏，原因是什么？”赵襄子说：“晋阳之战，赵氏危急，宗庙社稷差点不保。群臣皆有轻慢心，只有高赫不失君臣之礼，因此先奖赏他。
target: After defeating Zhi Yao and relieving the siege of Jinyang, Zhao Xiangzi rewarded the five meritorious people, the first of whom was Gao He. Zhang Mengtan asked, "In the battle of Jinyang, Gao He didn't make a significant contribution. Why is he the first to be rewarded?" Zhao Xiangzi replied, "During the battle of Jinyang, the Zhao family was in a critical situation, and the ancestral temple and the national altar were almost lost. All the ministers were somewhat negligent, only Gao He maintained the etiquette of a monarch and his subjects, so he is rewarded first."

context:
### Idiom: 万马奔腾
### Meaning: ①无数匹马奔跑跳跃。②常用以形容声势浩大、气魄宏伟、进展迅速等情状。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
Translated by google_api; Corpus: web
source: 成吉思汗戎马一身，葬身的墓地却被万马奔腾踏平。
target: Genghis Khan was dressed as a soldier, but the cemetery where he was buried was trampled by thousands of galloping horses.

context:
### Idiom: 运筹帷幄
### Meaning: 谓在后方决定作战策略。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
Translated by google_api; Corpus: wikipedia
source: 萧赫麟（1968年7月1日—），原名萧炳贤中华民国无党籍政治人物。萧赫麟还有个别名“齐原”他在演艺圈当过制作人、办活动，也曾在商界当过运筹帷幄的咨商顾问，工作经历丰富，尽管是政治素人，但他长年为弱势奔走，博得“陈情达人”称号，也因为长期协助弱势解决问题，才发现基层民众的困境，而台湾政治依然陷入两大党的污泥恶斗心机算计，台湾民众何时出头天？记者蓝振睿/综合报导。生于南投县，曾为新政世纪党、国会政党联盟、民主进步党党员，并曾被无党联盟、健保免费连线、人民最大党等政党提名，参与过第十届台北市议员选举、第八届立法委员选举、第二届新北市议员选举、第十三届台北市议员选举、第十届立法委员补选，惟目前未有当选之纪录。
target: Xiao Helin (July 1, 1968 -), formerly known as Xiao Bingxian, is a politician without party membership in the Republic of China. Xiao Helin is also known as "Qi Yuan". He has worked as a producer and event organizer in the entertainment industry, and has also worked as a strategizing consultant in the business world. He has rich work experience. Although he is a political amateur, he has been working for the disadvantaged for many years. He won the title of "Chen Qing Master" because he has been helping the disadvantaged to solve problems for a long time, and he discovered the plight of the grassroots people. However, Taiwan's politics is still mired in the vicious intrigues of the two major parties. When will the Taiwanese people make a difference? Reporter Lan Zhenrui/Comprehensive Report. Born in Nantou County, he was a member of the New Deal Century Party, the Congress Party Alliance, and the Democratic Progressive Party. He was nominated by the Non-Party Alliance, the National Health Insurance Free Connection, the People's Largest Party and other political parties. He participated in the 10th Taipei City Council election and the 19th Taipei City Councilor Election. The 8th Legislative Council Election, the 2nd New Taipei City Councilor Election, the 13th Taipei City Councilor Election, and the 10th Legislative Councilor By-election, but there is currently no record of being elected.

### Idiom: 焦头烂额
### Meaning: ①形容被火烧伤得很严重。②指牺牲惨重。③喻处境狼狈或十分窘迫。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
Translated by qwen-14b-chat; Corpus: weibo
source: 今天也被问到了关于离别的事。虽然各种查让大家都焦头烂额，但我突然希望这个运动会开长一点，让那些人继续各种查，这样我就可以名正言顺地多逃避一段时间。我一点都不想知道最后前途几何、出路何方，我现在就想逃开这个话题。
target: Today I was asked about parting as well. Although the various checks have driven everyone crazy, I suddenly hope that this sports meeting will be longer, so that those people can continue the various checks, so that I can have a good reason to escape for a longer period of time. I don't want to know at all about the future prospects and出路何方, I just want to escape from this topic now.

context:
### Idiom: 虹销雨霁
### Meaning: 虹彩虹；销同消”，消失；霁本指雨止，也引申为天气放睛。彩虹消失，雨后天睛。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
Translated by gpt4; Corpus: web
source: 余干县博物馆开展“国际古迹遗址日”宣传活动。安阳殷墟博物馆在4月18日为积极响应国际遗址日的号召，特别推出了以“静看商朝的虹销雨霁”为主题的线上课程。本次活动通过现场发放《文物保护法律法规》及文物知识普及宣传资料、悬挂宣传条幅、开展相关文物法律及法规咨询服务等形式，向广大市民群众进行文物的保护知识、文化遗产相关法律的科普宣传。
target: The Yugan County Museum launched a publicity campaign for "International Day for Monuments and Sites". In response to the call for International Sites Day on April 18, the Anyang Yin Ruins Museum specially launched an online course themed "Watching the Rainbow Disappear after the Rain in the Shang Dynasty". This event disseminated knowledge about the protection of cultural relics and related laws to the general public through various means, such as distributing "Cultural Relics Protection Laws and Regulations" and popularizing promotional materials, hanging promotional banners, and providing related cultural relics legal and regulatory consulting services.

context:
### Idiom: 无往不胜
### Meaning: 无论到哪儿没有不胜利的。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
Translated by google_api; Corpus: weibo
source: “告我地球同胞，敌人没有无往不胜的锋锐，并非无可战胜之神，但有我浩然军魂一息尚存，必与这些数典忘祖之辈血战到底，以安我同胞生者之心，慰我同胞死者之灵。” “我等愿身化飞灰，扬于百万星河。
target: "I tell my compatriots on the earth that the enemy is not invincible and not an invincible god. However, as long as my awe-inspiring military spirit is still alive, I will fight to the end with these people who have forgotten their ancestors. In order to appease the hearts of my compatriots, the living, and to comfort the hearts of my compatriots, the dead. Spirit." "We are willing to turn into flying ashes and fly across millions of galaxies.

context:
### Idiom: 黑漆一团
### Meaning: ①指墨团。②形容非弛暗，没有一点光明。或对人对事一无所知。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
Translated by qwen-14b-chat; Corpus: weibo
source: 因为你内心污染得厉害，自己的光明被遮盖住了，佛光想灌都灌不进来。你们打起坐来，不管开眼也好，闭眼也好，黑漆一团，一团乌烟瘴气，这就证明地狱在你面前。等你定慧到了，只要一定，自身光明随时都可以跟佛的光明相接！
target: Because your inner pollution is so serious that your own brightness is covered, the Buddha's light wants to灌灌不进来. When you sit, no matter whether you open your eyes or close them, it is black一团一团乌烟瘴气, which proves that hell is in front of you. When your concentration and wisdom reach a certain level, as long as you are determined, your own brightness can be connected with the Buddha's brightness at any time!

context:
### Idiom: 打肿脸充胖子
### Meaning: 比喻宁可付出代价而硬充作了不起。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
Translated by qwen-14b-chat; Corpus: cc-news
source: 不少机构在当地兴建大型数据中心，这些高科技工程虽然能在短期提拔经济，但不能为当地带来长久收入。另外，地方财政缺乏透明度，政府通过大规模转移支付和大举借债，让经济数据‘打肿脸充胖子’，只要进入偿债周期，就会面临困局。此外，贵州的经济受大陆大环境经济影响，随房地产市场下行，人口出生率负增长、城镇化速度减慢，相信土地财政会迎来更大风险。
target: Many institutions have built large-scale data centers locally, which can promote the economy in the short term, but cannot bring sustainable income to the local economy. In addition, the local fiscal transparency is lacking, and the government makes economic data look good by massive transfers and borrowing, which will face difficulties as soon as they enter the repayment cycle. In addition, Guizhou's economy is affected by the overall economic environment on the mainland. With the decline of the real estate market, the negative population growth rate and the slowing urbanization rate, it is believed that land finance will face greater risks.

context:
### Idiom: 惊耳骇目
### Meaning: 耳闻目见后内心震惊。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
Translated by alma-13b-lora; Corpus: wikipedia
source: 王昌龄文学创作论以“意”为中心，也是借鉴佛教“意”和“意识”的观念。王昌龄受推许为“七绝圣手”，唐代殷璠赞许王昌龄真正能继承建安风骨，“惊耳骇目”，是东晋以后几百年间内振起颓势的“中兴之作”，认可王昌龄与储光羲可与曹植、谢灵运并驾齐驱。晚唐时流行的一部说诗杂著《琉璃堂墨客图》，尊称王昌龄为“诗天子”。
target: The literary creation theory of Wang Changling centers on the concept of "yì" and also draws upon the concepts of "yì" and "consciousness" of Buddhism. Wang Changling was hailed as the "saintly hand of the Seven-character verse" by the Tang Dynasty Yin Zheng, and was recognized as the "revival of the spirit of Jianan" by Yin Zheng, "shocking and frightening" and "the work of restoration" during the period of the decline of the Eastern Jin Dynasty, which was the "restoration of the spirit of the revival" and was compared with Chu Guangxi and Xie Lingyun. In the late Tang Dynasty, the literary collection "A Treatise on Poetry" was popular, and Wang Changling was hailed as the "poet king".

context:
### Idiom: 丰神绰约
### Meaning: 绰约形容女子体态柔美的样子。指女子体态柔美丰满。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
Translated by alma-13b-lora; Corpus: weibo
source: 这种风格极其、极其挑人。要风流不下流，要风情不摇晃，要丰神绰约但不花枝招展，要顾盼生情但不暗送秋波。最重要的是，要万花丛中过，但必须片叶不沾身。
target: This style is most difficult and most challenging. It must be elegant but not vulgar, it must be charming but not flirtatious, it must be full of spirit but not showy, and it must be romantic but not coquettish. Most importantly, it must pass through the flower field, but it must not get any of the petals on its body.

context:
### Idiom: 反躬自责
### Meaning: 回过头来责备自己。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
Translated by alma-13b-lora; Corpus: weibo
source: 佛法从根本上揭示“相”和“命”的由来和原理，却不教人去看相、算命；因为这是舍本逐未，徒劳无益的。现在社会上许多人相信占星、看相、算命，把自己的前程，未来的命运，都寄托在这上面，却不反躬自责，修省心地。听说自己的相好运好，便存侥幸心理，滋长贪欲；听说相和运不好，有厄难，又恐怖仓惶，生退悔心。
target: Buddhism from the core reveals the origin and principle of "xiang" and "ming", but it does not teach people to look at the face or calculate the fate; because this is a waste and useless. Nowadays, many people believe in astrology, face reading, and fortune telling, and entrust their future and fate to this, but do not reflect on themselves and reform their hearts. When they hear that their face is good and that they have good luck, they will have a feeling of luck and have a sense of entitlement. When they hear that their face is bad and that they have misfortune, they will be frightened and confused.

context:
### Idiom: 一天一地
### Meaning: 满天满地。形容到处都是。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
Translated by mt0-13b; Corpus: web
source: 严禁以组织名义通知、操办应由个人操办的婚丧喜庆事宜。宴请人员严格控制在亲属亲戚的范围内，限定一事一天一地办理，不准长时间、分批次、多地点或采取其他“化整为零”的方式变相大操大办。严禁在五星级酒店、私人会所办理婚丧喜庆事宜。
target: No organizations may announce, prepare, or host funerals that are not supposed to be handled by individuals. Catering is strictly limited to family and friends, one event at a time, not long, in multiple places, or by other "all in one way" means. No funerals are held in five-star hotels or private clubs.

### Idiom: 别创一格
### Meaning: 指开创一种新的风格或形式。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
Translated by qwen-14b-chat; Corpus: wikipedia
source: 《三国志》是三国时代结束后不久，由3世纪末历史学家陈寿所著之中国历代史实。体例属纪传体的分国史，又无表、志，在断代史中别创一格。三国志记载中国三国时代历史的断代史，同时也是二十四史中评价最高的“前四史”之一。
target: "Records of the Three Kingdoms" is a historical account of the Chinese dynasties compiled by Chen Shou, a historian at the end of the third century. It is a national history in the annalistic style, with no tables or chronicles, and is unique in the genre of discontinuous history. "Records of the Three Kingdoms" documents the discontinuous history of the Three Kingdoms period in China and is also one of the "four histories" with the highest evaluation among the 24 dynastic histories.

### Idiom: 眠花醉柳
### Meaning: 比喻狎妓。同眠花宿柳”。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
Translated by qwen-14b-chat; Corpus: weibo
source: 眠花醉柳，西风下酒，此刻倒是羡慕了史湘云。
target: Sleep among flowers and drink with willows, while the western wind serves as the wine. At this moment, I envy Xishi Yangyun.

context:
### Idiom: 无相无作
### Meaning: ①佛教语。指弃绝众相，不事造作。②泛指不务空言。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
Translated by google_api; Corpus: weibo
source: 世尊往昔说法既久，我时在座，身体疲懈，但念空无相无作，于菩萨法，游戏神通，净佛国土，成就众生，心不喜乐。所以者何？世尊令我等出于三界，得涅槃证，又今我等，年已朽迈，于佛教化菩萨阿耨多罗三藐三菩提，不生一念好乐之心。
target: The World Honored One has been teaching the Dharma for a long time. I was sitting here, physically exhausted, but my mind was empty and formless, and I was playing with my supernatural powers, purifying the Buddha's land, and achieving enlightenment for all sentient beings. My heart was not happy. So what? The World-Honored One has caused us to emerge from the three realms and achieve Nirvana. And now, as we age, we have become the Bodhisattva Anuttarasamyaksambodhi in Buddhism and do not have a single thought of happiness.

### Meaning: 复又，再。也是这样。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
Translated by qwen-14b-chat; Corpus: wikipedia
source: 现任挪威君主为哈拉尔五世，是1997年1月17日接替父亲奥拉夫五世继位，法定储君为陛下唯一一个儿子哈康王储。王储承担各种公共礼仪职能，国王的妻子宋雅王后亦复如是。在国王不在国内期间，哈康王储也担任摄政王。
target: The current Norwegian monarch is Harald V, who succeeded his father Olav V on January 17, 1997, and the designated heir to the throne is His Majesty's only son, Crown Prince Haakon. The Crown Prince undertakes various public ceremonial functions, and Queen Sonja also does so. During the king's absence from the country, Crown Prince Haakon also serves as regent.

### Idiom: 突然袭击
### Meaning: 指军事上出其不意地攻击。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
Translated by gpt4; Corpus: weibo
source: 但是我在敏感多疑的同时又很容易获得短暂的满足，经常会因为一些小事，即使是一句话就觉得他好爱我。可是事实上每一个突然袭击我大脑的过往的瞬间又会敲击的我陷入沉思——他真的有他所说的、有我短暂感觉到的那么在乎我吗？。
target: But while I am sensitive and suspicious, I also find it easy to gain fleeting satisfaction. Often, even a small thing or a single sentence can make me feel loved by him. However, every sudden flashback that strikes my mind would plunge me into contemplation - does he really care about me as much as he says, as much as I briefly feel?

I'm going to talk to you about the health and happiness English names!

### Idiom: 无官一身轻
### Meaning: 不做官了，感到一身轻松。封建官僚官以后常用这句话来自我安慰。现也泛指卸去责任后一时感到轻松。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
Translated by alma-13b-lora; Corpus: wikipedia
source: 保诚称经内部调查，决定终止与其合约，并称公司有清晰的“社交媒体指引”，员工及理财顾问应当遵守。林作回覆传媒确认消息，称由公司最高层致电通知，未提及原因，估计因为网民攻击公司，故在舆轮压力下作此决定，又称自己“无官一身轻”。港大临床医学院精神医学系讲座教授陈友凯批评精神科患者需要排期约55至95星期（至少一年或以上），有关情况不可接受，指长时间的等待容易令病情恶化，从而导致悲剧。
target: Parkway said it had decided to terminate its contract with the doctor after an internal investigation, and that the company has a clear "social media guide" that its employees and financial advisors must follow. Lin confirmed the news to the media and said that the company's top executives called to notify him, but did not mention the reason, and estimated that the company had to make this decision under pressure from the public, and said that he was "light as a feather" without any official duties. Professor Chan Yuk Kei, a professor of Psychiatry at The Chinese University of Hong Kong, criticized that mental health patients need to wait 55 to 95 weeks (at least one year or more) for an appointment, which is unacceptable. The long waiting time is likely to aggravate the patients' conditions, which may lead to tragedy.

source: 统俟各县漕务完竣，帮船全数渡江之后，即将该给事中所指各情确切查明，据实核办。总之天庾正供在所宜急，而不肖州县浮收勒折之弊不可不惩。该抚等惟当勤恤民隐，率由旧章，以裕国计而厚民生，是为至要。
target: After the completion of the tax collection in each county, the ferryboats were all transported across the river. The specific details of all the circumstances should be investigated and dealt with accordingly. In general, the tax collection should be conducted in a timely manner, and the improper conduct of the incompetent governors of Zhuozhou County, which has caused the people to suffer, should not be neglected. It is the duty of the inspectors to be diligent in protecting the people. They should make use of the old regulations and enrich the people as a way of benefiting the country. This is of vital importance.

**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

source: 2011年11月，在沙特等海湾阿拉伯国家施压下，萨利赫被迫辞职，其副总统哈迪则在2012年的总统大选中胜出，领导新一届也门政府。然已被挑起的骚乱无法平息，在胡塞武装、南方运动分头起事下，也门政府军分身乏术，无法恢复秩序，尽管出身南也门的哈迪多少能够管束南方运动，北部的胡塞却始终桀敖不驯。时至2014年，胡塞武装已占领也门北部大片土地，包括首都萨那，哈迪被迫同意与胡塞共组‘联合政府’，但双方在总理与石油部长人选上缺乏共识，最终联合政府宣告流产，也门内战乃于2015年正式白热化，胡塞武装遂在萨那建立新政府，哈迪则与支持者撤退到亚丁，其个人随后又流亡至沙特。
target: In November 2011, under pressure from Gulf Arab countries like Saudi Arabia, Saleh was forced to resign, and his vice president Hadi won the presidential election in 2012, leading the new Yemeni government. However, the unrest that had been stirred up could not be quelled. Under the combined uprising of the Houthi militia and the Southern Movement, the Yemeni government forces were unable to restore order. Although Hadi, who was from South Yemen, could somewhat control the Southern Movement, the Houthis in the north remained defiant. By 2014, the Houthi militia had occupied large areas of northern Yemen, including the capital Sana'a. Hadi was forced to agree to form a 'unity government' with the Houthis, but the two sides lacked consensus on the selection of the prime minister and the oil minister. Eventually, the unity government was declared a failure, and the Yemeni civil war officially escalated in 2015. The Houthi militia then established a new government in Sana'a, while Hadi and his supporters retreated to Aden, with Hadi himself subsequently going into exile in Saudi Arabia.

### Idiom: 不刊之典
### Meaning: 指不能更改或磨灭的有关帝王的记载、钦定典制。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
Translated by mt0-13b; Corpus: wikipedia
source: 转任刑部侍郎，集贤学士如故。唐穆宗曾问侍臣：“朕想要学习经史，以何为先？”薛放说“《六经》是先圣之至言，仲尼所发扬阐明，都是天人之极致，真是万代不刊之典。史书记录前代成败得失的事迹，也足以鉴其兴亡。
target: As a justice of the Criminal Department, he still gathered wise men. When the emperor asked a servant: "What should I learn in the books of the ancients, which should I study first?", 薛放 said: "The Six Elements are the wise advice of the ancients, and the explanations of Confucius are a very wonderful exposition of the ancient doctrine, which is a very rare book that will be kept alive throughout the ages."

context:
### Idiom: 抚今追昔
### Meaning: 抚拍，摸，引伸为注意，注视；追回想；昔过去。看看现在，想想过去。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
Translated by alma-13b-lora; Corpus: web
source: 为贯彻习近平总书记关于离退休干部工作的重要指示精神，体现对退休干部的关心关爱，增强老同志荣誉感和归属感，10月19日，云南省巧家县教体局举行职工荣誉退休仪式，欢送5名同志光荣退休，同时召开2022年重阳节座谈会，邀请部分原退休的老领导、老同志参加。退休老领导代表刘光汉老师深情回忆了曾经在一起奋斗的岁月，抚今追昔，感慨万分。同时祝愿所有退休的老领导、老同志们保持身心健康，不断丰富精神文化，安享退休后的美好生活。
target: In order to implement the important instructions of General Secretary Xi Jinping on the retirement work of retired cadres, to care about and concern the retired cadres, and to enhance the sense of honor and belonging of old comrades, the Koujie County Education and Sports Bureau held a ceremony for the honorable retirement of 5 comrades on October 19, and held a discussion meeting on the 2022 Mid-Autumn Festival. Some of the former retired leaders and comrades were invited to participate. Liu Guanghan, an old teacher, made a deep and emotional speech, recalling the years of hard work in the past, and feeling deeply moved. He also wished all the retired leaders and comrades to maintain physical and mental health, enrich their cultural spirit, and enjoy a happy life after retirement.

source: 粗茶淡饭随缘过，富贵荣华莫强求。
target: Live life as you please, don't force wealth and glory.

source: 我打算，用微博，记录我得状态。我希望我好起来，纵使生活鸡零狗碎，我也要把他慢慢拼凑起来，我不怕艰难险阻，我怕我自己好不起来，就这样倒下一蹶不振。#你好生活#
target: I plan to use Weibo to record my state. I hope I get better, even if life is shattered, I will also piece it together slowly. I am not afraid of difficulties and obstacles, I am afraid that I will not get better, and fall down and never get up like this. #Hello Life#

source: 以敦愚计，恐将来有危亡之忧。愿思全身远害，不得有所顾念也。”统乃流涕从之，遂定谋归太祖。
target: With Thou's stupid plan, I fear that I will suffer a future danger. Please think of the long-term danger, don't think of the short term.' The king tearfully agreed to it and decided to seek the advice of the emperor.

### Idiom: 韬晦之计
### Meaning: 韬把才华隐藏起来；晦不让人知道自己的踪迹。指隐藏才能，不使外露。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
Translated by gpt4; Corpus: weibo
source: 遇到智者多虑、能者多劳的困境，韬晦之计才是正道的光。
target: When encountering the predicament of the wise worrying too much and the capable working too hard, the strategy of keeping a low profile is the light of the right path.

context:
### Idiom: 牛溲马勃
### Meaning: 牛溲牛尿，一说车前草，利小便；马勃可治疮。比喻一般人认为无用的东西，在懂得其性能的人手里可成为有用的物品。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
Translated by alma-13b-lora; Corpus: cc-news
source: 赛瑞斯的粪便移植药丸，专供抗生素治疗过的再患者使用。十年前就有医生说，他们用粪便移植疗法治愈患者；牛溲马勃皆可入药，食药局 去年批准费灵制药的粪便移植药，这个‘初版’药要从肛门塞入。赛瑞斯的药丸叫做Vowst，每日服用四颗，连服三天即可。
target: Seres's faecal transplant capsule is designed for patients who have had antibiotics to treat their infection. A decade ago, doctors were saying they were curing patients with faecal transplant therapy; dung was being fed to cows, which then produced milk which was used to make medicine. The first version of the capsule, which was approved by the FDA last year, had to be inserted into the rectum. Seres's capsule is called Vowst and is taken four times a day for three days.

### Meaning: 阮囊亚代阮孚的钱袋；羞涩难为情。比喻经济困难。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

source: 自己没公职，又被当作民进党‘弃儿’、屡被‘小英门生’打压，支持者为他抱屈，但是反而可以让他接触更多蓝营或中间选民，在蓝大于绿的台东是个助力。赖坤成表示，立委初选的登记费高达75万元，最近辞官没收入、股票又套牢，阮囊羞涩，不好对外募款，企业界朋友也都不看好，家人更强烈反对，然而一股寻求在台东最后一战的强烈意愿趋势著他排除万难毅然决定投入，有信心自己一辈子累积的各领域经验、丰沛人脉、自然幽默的问政风格可以丰富台东未来4年，让台东很热闹、让国会很轻松。刘櫂豪则在脸书表示，虽然结果不如预期，也感到意外，仍然秉持正面团队的态度，尊重初选结果。
target: He has no public office, is regarded as an 'outcast' of the Democratic Progressive Party, and has been repeatedly suppressed by the 'little British protégé'. His supporters feel aggrieved for him, but on the contrary, it can allow him to contact more blue camp or middle-of-the-road voters. In a world where blue is greater than green, Taitung is a helper. Lai Kuncheng said that the registration fee for the legislative primary election was as high as 750,000 yuan. He recently resigned and had no income, and his stocks were locked up. Ruan was cash-strapped and it was difficult to raise funds from the outside world. His friends in the business world were not optimistic, and his family members were even more strongly opposed. However, once His strong will to pursue the final battle in Taitung drove him to overcome all difficulties and resolutely decide to invest. He is confident that his lifelong experience in various fields, abundant contacts, and natural and humorous political style can enrich Taitung in the next four years and make Taitung more prosperous. It was lively and made Congress very relaxed. Liu Chuhao said on Facebook that although the results were not as good as expected, he was surprised, but he still maintained a positive team attitude and respected the results of the primary election.
